name: Smoking Crack Simulator: Origins
description: Smoking Crack Simulator: Origins is an origin story and continuation of the Smoking Crack Simulator. Set in the fake town of Emerald Lake City, you must try to live after getting addicted to crack with your friend Ethan. You and your roommate Ethan live in the downtown Ockmont area of the city. You must earn money through jobs or by selling drugs, where in different skill sets will aid you. You have to defend yourself from robbers, crackheads and gang members.
